pullRequest.body:
Rename some definitions and theorems about $SL(2, ℤ)$ in `Analysis/Complex/UpperHalfPlane/Basic.lean` to place them in the namespace `UpperHalfPlane.ModularGroup`, in order to avoid the confusion with definitions and theorems about $SL(2, ℝ)$. For example, `UpperHalfPlane.det_coe'` is renamed to `UpperHalfPlane.ModularGroup.det_coe'`, because we will have `UpperHalfPlane.SL2R.det_coe'`.

[Discussion on Zulip](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/144837-PR-reviews/topic/.237885.20add.20namespace.20.60UpperHalfPlane.2EModularGroup.60)

---

nodes.body: Can you explain the motivation in the PR title? Was this discussed on Zulip?
Yeah I don't see this causing any problems, but I also don't understand why we need it.  That said, if you think it's needed then that's fine with me.

Thanks :tada: 

If CI passes, please remove the label `awaiting-CI` and merge this yourself, by adding a comment `bors r+`.

bors d+
